seo.description: In Mauritius, Indian Ocean and Africa, EO Solutions makes technologies accessible for performing workplaces with pioneering Printing and Cash Handling Solutions
EO Solutions, for your queries about printing, mailing, cash handling, office equipment, imaging & graphic communication & supplies and services
EO Solutions is a provider for workplace systems & solutions, a distributor of renowned worldwide brands in Mauritius, Indian Ocean Islands and some African countries
Stay tuned for News at EO Solutions, our experts are at your service

Introducing our newest products to help you print faster, be more productive, and produce higher quality documents. With features such as built-in Wi-Fi, color touch-screens, Xerox ConnectKey®, Apple® AirPrint™, and more, Xerox products offer the latest in printer technology.

Imaging & Graphic Communication-Related Solutions by Fujifilm, has earned the trust of graphics professionals worldwide by taking the lead in providing reliable and convenient solutions that raise productivity and quality. Our digital minilabs and other retail photo solutions brings to you, beautiful prints using environmentally friendly technology. We give form to a wide range of memories and events through film and photographs and contribute to enrich emotional lives and stronger human connections.

We have the perfect solutions for small retailers to large cash-in-transit companies for every cash handling task; ex: Commercial Banks, Retail enterprises, Service companies, Gambling, Petrol stations, Car dealerships, Transport, Restaurants, Hotels, Ticket offices, Cash centres, Exchange offices, Supermarkets, etc.

Our portfolio of Paper consists of Paper rolls for Electronic Cash registers, Photocopy Paper and Wide format Paper as well as speciality media for colour printing. We offers specialty media and graphic supplies as a complete solution thanks to the high quality products of the well-known brand HEXIS.

We have the solution for every finishing task which is perfect for Corporate offices, Banking sector, Printshops, Retail enterprises, Government offices, Service companies, Restaurants, Hotels, Insurance companies, Engineering companies, Advertising agencies, Distribution companies, Educational institutions etc.
